data.title: Lagardère Radio
data.meta_description: Lagardère Radio comprises Europe 1, the French music radio networks (Europe 2 and RFM) and advertising sales brokerage.They attract 5 million listeners every day.
data.text:
Lagardère Radio comprises Europe 1, the French music radio networks (Europe 2 and RFM) and advertising sales brokerage.

They attract 5 million listeners every day.

Organization

Division : Corporate and other activities

Details

2 Rue des Cévennes

75015 Paris

(33) 01 80 20 30 00

(33) 01 87 15 40 00

communication@lagarderenews.com

Created in 1992, Lagardère is an international group with operations in more than 40 countries worldwide. It employs around 31,300 people and generated revenue of €8,081 million in 2023.

The Group is structured around two priority divisions.
